toc-how-do-i-use-ethereum: Ɔkwan bɛn so na me de Ethereum bɛ di dwuma?
toc-what-is-ethereum-used-for: Dɛn adwuma na wɔde Ethereum di?
hero-subtitle: Wo nwomasua kwankyerɛfo ma Ethereum wiase. Sua sɛnea Ethereum si fa yɛ adwuma ne sɛnea wo bɛ tumi abɛka ho bi. Kratafa wei kura nea ɛyɛ nimdesɛm ne nea ɛnyɛ nimdesɛm wↄ akwankyerɛ ne akadeɛ.
what-is-crypto-1: Ebia na woate ntanɛte so sika wo nka, duasin-nkɔnsonkɔnson ne Bitcoin. Nsɛm a ɛda aseɛ ho bɛboa ma woasua nea wɔyɛ ne sɛnea ɛfa Ethereum ho.
what-is-crypto-2: Ntanɛte so sika (Cryptocurrencies) bi ti sɛ bitcoin boa obi biara ma wotumi mane sika kɔ wiase aman nyinaa so. Ethereum nso tumi yɛ saa, nanso yɛ tumi kyerɛw code wɔ so de di dwumadie nso di si adwumakuo. Ɛtim hɔ pintinn sanso yɛ mmerɛ: computer so dwumadie biara bɛyɛ adwuma wɔ Ethereum so. Sua bi ka ho na hu sɛnea wo bɛ tumi ɛfi ase:
what-is-ethereum-card-description: Sɛ woyɛ afei na w'aba a, fi aseɛ wↄ ha sua sɛnti a Ethereum wo hia.
what-is-ethereum-card-image-alt: Mfoni a ɛkyerɛ obi a ɔrehwɛ gua so, a na ɛkyerɛ sɛ egyina hɔ ma Ethereum.
what-is-eth-description: Ether (ETH) yɛ sika a ɛma Ethereum nɛtewɛk ne ne dwumadie tumi.
what-is-web3-card-description: Web3 yɛ nhwɛsoɔ ma sɛnea wo ntanɛte so agyapadeɛ ni nipa ko wo yɛ ɛsom bo.
additional-reading-more-on-ethereum-basi: Nsɛm dodoɔ fa Ethereum nhyɛaseɛ ho
guides-hub-desc: Akwankyerɛ: asekyerɛ ɛnam so baako baako ma Ethereum ɛho adeyɛ
quiz-hub-desc: Asɛmmisa dwaberɛ: sɔ wo nimdeɛ hwɛ
additional-reading-ethereum-in-thirty-mi: Ethereum wɔ simma aduasa mu a efri Vitalik Buterin hↄ
additional-reading-get-eth: Sua ɔkwan a wo namso de bɛ nya ETH
how-do-i-use-ethereum-1: Ethereum a yɛ di dwuma tumi gyina ho ma nneɛma ahorow ma nnipa ahorow. Ebia na wo pɛ sɛ wo di dwuma, kyerɛ nipa ko a woyɛ anaa mane obi ETH. Nea wo bɛ hia a adi kan ne wo sikakorae (akawnt). Akwan a ɛnyɛ den sɛ wo bɛ bɔ wo sikakorae (akawnt) anya wo akwan ni wo ntanɛte sika kotoku.
what-is-a-wallet-card-description: Kɔmputa sika kotoku te sɛ sika kotoku ankasa; wɔkora nea wuhia na wode akyerɛ sɛ oniakorↄ a woyɛ na woanya mmeae a wubu no sɛ ɛsom bo no.
find-a-wallet-card-description: Gyina nneɛma a ɛho hia wo so fa hwehwɛ sika kotoku mu.
crypto-security-basics-card-description: Sua sɛnea wubehu asisie ne sɛnea wobɛkwati nnaadaa a wɔtaa de di dwuma no.
things-to-consider-banner-title: Nneɛma a ɛsɛ sɛ wususuw ho bere a wode Ethereum redi dwuma no
things-to-consider-banner-1: Ethereum dwumadie biara hwehwɛ sɛ wotua sika wɔ ETH kwan so, sɛ mpo ɛho hia sɛ wode token ahorow a wɔasisi wɔ Ethereum so te sɛ stablecoins USDC anaa DAI no kɔ baabi foforo.
things-to-consider-banner-2: Ɛka betumi ayɛ kɛse a egyina nnipa dodow a wɔrebɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔde Ethereum bedi dwuma so, enti yɛhyɛ nyansa sɛ fa
additional-reading-more-on-using-ethereu: Bebree fa Ethereum a wɔde bedi dwuma ho
additional-reading-how-to-create-an-ethe: Sɛnea wo tumi bɔ Ethereum sikakorae
additional-reading-how-to-use-a-wallet: Sɛnea yɛdi sika kotoku no di dwuma
additional-reading-layer-2: Layer 2: dwumadie ho ka a wɔbɛtew so
what-is-ethereum-used-for-1: Ethereum ama wɔayɛ nneɛma ne nnwuma afoforↄ a ebetumi ama yɛn asetena mu mmeae ahorow atu mpɔn. Yɛda so ara wɔ mfiase nanso pii wɔ hɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn ani gye ho.
defi-card-description: Hwehwɛ sikasɛm nhyehyɛe foforↄ a wɔasi a sikakorabea nni mu na obiara betumi akɔ mu.
stablecoins-card-description: Cryptocurrencies a wɔde abɔ sika, aguade, anaa sikasɛm mu adwinnade foforo bi bo ho.
nft-card-description: Gyina hɔ ma nneɛma soronko a obi wɔ, efi adwinni so kosi agyapade ho nkrataa so kosi kɔnsɛt tekiti so.
dao-card-description: Ma kwan foforↄ a wɔfa so yɛ adwuma a ɔpanyin nnim no nyɛ adwuma.
dapp-card-title: Nnwuma a wɔde ahyɛ aman nsa (dapps)
dapp-card-description: Yɛ dijitaal sikasɛm a ɛfa afɛfoↄ nnwuma ho.
emerging-use-cases-title: Nneɛma a wɔde di dwuma a afei na ɛrepue
emerging-use-cases-description: Nnwuma afoforo a agye din nso wɔ hɔ a wɔde Ethereum reyɛ anaa wɔretu nu mpɔn:
play-to-earn: Agodie a wɔde di agoru a wɔde nya sika (P2E)
fundraising-through-quadratic-funding: Sika a wɔboaboa ano denam Quadratic Funding so
supply-chain-management: Nneɛma a wɔde ma ho nhyehyɛeɛ
more-on-ethereum-use-cases: Nsɛm pii fa Ethereum dwumadie ho
more-on-ethereum-use-cases-link: Blockchain wɔ aman a afei na wɔrenya nkɔso mu
strengthening-the-ethereum-network-descr: Wubetumi aboa ama woanya Ethereum na woanya akatua bere koro no ara mu denam wo ETH a wode bɛhyɛ mu no so. Ɛsono akwan horow a wobɛfa so de awowa a egyina wo nimdesɛm ho nimdeɛ ne ETH dodow a wowɔ so.
staking-ethereum-card-description: Sua ɔkwan a wode bɛ fi aseɛ di wo ETH asi awowa.
run-a-node-card-description: Di dwuma titiriw wɔ Ethereum nɛtewɛk no mu denam node bi a wobɛma so.
learn-about-ethereum-protocol-descriptio: Wɔn a wɔde di dwuma a wɔn ani gye Ethereum nɛtewɛk no nimdesɛm fa no ho kɛse no.
energy-consumption-card-description: Ahoɔden ahe na Ethereum de di dwuma?
ethereum-upgrades-card-description: Ethereums kwankyerɛ ma nu tumi sesa scalable, ahobammɔ, na ɛkɔ so daa.
ethereum-whitepaper-card-description: Ethereum nsusuwii a edi kan a Vitalik Buterin kyerɛwee wɔ afe 2014 mu.
more-on-ethereum-protocol-title: Bebree fa Ethereum protocol no ho
more-on-ethereum-protocol-consensus: Ethereum adanse a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn ho ahyɛ mu a egyina adwene a ɛwɔ hɔ so'
more-on-ethereum-protocol-evm: Ethereum kɔmputa a wɔde ahyɛ mu (The EVM)
ethereum-community-description: Ethereum nkonimdi no fi ne mpɔtam a wɔatu wɔn ho ama a ɛyɛ nwonwa. Nnipa mpempem pii a wɔhyɛ nkuran na wɔkanyan wɔn boa ma wɔpia Ethereum’s anisoadehunu kɔ n’anim, bere a wɔsan nso de ahobammɔ ma ntwamutam no denam awowa ne nniso so. Bra bɛka yɛn ho!
community-hub-card-description: Nnipa a wofi mmeae ahorow nyinaa ka yɛn mpɔtam hɔ.
community-hub-card-alt: Mfoni a ɛkyerɛ adansifo kuw bi a wɔbom reyɛ adwuma.
get-involved-card-description: Wo (yiw, wo!) yɛma wɔ akwaaba sɛ wobɛboa Ethereum mpɔtam.
online-communities-card-description: Ntanɛte so mpɔtam ma wonya hokwan kɛse sɛ wubebisa nsɛm pɔtee pii anaasɛ wode wo ho bɛhyɛ mu.
mastering-ethereum-description: Ↄpɛnimaa 23, 2018 – Andreas M. Antonopoulos, Gavin Wood Ph.D.
bankless-description: Akwankyerɛ a ɛfa Crypto sikasɛm ho
zeroknowledge-description: Kɔ akyiri kɔ mfiridwuma a ɛbɛma tumi wɔ nea wɔde ahyɛ amansa nsa wɛb a ɛrepue ne mpɔtam a wɔrekyekye eyi no mu
green-pill-description: Hwehwɛ crypto-sikasɛm nhyehyɛe ahorow a ɛma abɔnten so nneɛma pa ma wiase no mu
unchained-description: Ɛdɔ asukↄ wɔ nnipa a wɔrekyekye dea yɛde ahyɛ amansa nsa intanɛt, nsɛm a ɛfa saa mfiridwuma yi a ebetumi ahyɛ yɛn daakye ase, ne nsɛmti bi a ɛyɛ nsɔe wɔ crypto mu, te sɛ mmara, ahobammɔ ne kokoam nsɛm
the-daily-gwei-description: Ethereum amanneɛbɔ asɛmkabiom, nsɛm foforo ne nhwehwɛmu
